attributes.action: Reverse the decision to grant Margret Thatcher a state funeral.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This woman split the country in office and would split the country in death, should this state funeral be granted. It would be an insult to ex-miners, ex-dockers and ex-steelworkers to name but a few.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
